prompts.title: Develop a Digital Marketing Strategy for {{business_name}}
prompts.content: Create a comprehensive digital marketing strategy for {{business_name}} focusing on channels like SEO, PPC, social media, and email marketing to achieve {{business_goal}}.
prompts.description: Generates a digital marketing plan tailored to a specific business goal.

variables.name: business_goal
variables.description: The main goal of the marketing strategy
variables.example: increase online sales by 30% in Q2

prompts.title: Conduct a Digital Marketing Audit for {{website}}
prompts.content: Perform a detailed digital marketing audit for {{website}}, analyzing SEO performance, social media presence, content strategy, and PPC campaigns. Provide actionable recommendations.
prompts.description: Assesses current digital marketing efforts and suggests improvements.

prompts.title: Create a PPC Campaign for {{product_or_service}}
prompts.content: Design a pay-per-click advertising campaign for {{product_or_service}} targeting {{audience}}. Include keyword research, ad copy, and landing page suggestions.
prompts.description: Develops a PPC campaign to drive targeted traffic.

variables.name: product_or_service
variables.description: The product or service to advertise

variables.name: audience
variables.description: The target audience for the ads

prompts.title: Optimize Website for Mobile Users
prompts.content: Provide strategies to optimize {{website}} for mobile users, enhancing user experience and improving mobile search rankings.
prompts.description: Improves website performance on mobile devices.

prompts.title: Analyze Competitor's Digital Marketing Strategies
prompts.content: Conduct an analysis of {{competitor_name}}'s digital marketing strategies, including their SEO efforts, content marketing, social media, and PPC campaigns.
prompts.description: Provides insights into competitor's online marketing tactics.

prompts.title: Develop a Content Calendar for Digital Platforms
prompts.content: Create a monthly content calendar for {{business_name}}, scheduling posts across digital platforms like blogs, social media, and email newsletters.
prompts.description: Plans content distribution to maintain consistent online presence.

prompts.title: Implement Retargeting Ads for Abandoned Carts
prompts.content: Design a retargeting ad campaign to recover abandoned carts on {{ecommerce_website}}. Include ad creatives, messaging, and targeting options.
prompts.description: Aims to increase conversions by retargeting interested customers.

prompts.title: Set Up Google Analytics for {{website}}
prompts.content: Provide a step-by-step guide to set up Google Analytics for {{website}}, including goal tracking and custom dashboard creation.
prompts.description: Helps track and analyze website performance data.

variables.name: website
variables.description: The website to set up analytics for

prompts.title: Create a Digital Marketing Budget Plan
prompts.content: Develop a detailed budget plan for digital marketing activities for {{business_name}} over the next {{time_period}}.
prompts.description: Allocates funds efficiently across digital marketing channels.

variables.name: business_name
variables.description: The business needing a budget plan

variables.name: time_period
variables.description: The duration of the budget plan

prompts.title: Evaluate the ROI of Digital Marketing Campaigns
prompts.content: Analyze the return on investment for {{business_name}}'s recent digital marketing campaigns. Provide insights and recommendations for improvement.
prompts.description: Assesses campaign effectiveness in financial terms.

variables.name: business_name
variables.description: The business whose campaigns are being evaluated

prompts.title: Develop a Content Marketing Strategy for {{brand}}
prompts.content: Create a content marketing strategy for {{brand}} that includes target audience identification, content types, distribution channels, and KPIs.
prompts.description: Outlines a plan to attract and engage customers through content.

variables.name: brand
variables.description: The brand to develop a strategy for

prompts.title: Write a Series of Blog Posts on {{topic}}
prompts.content: Compose a series of {{number_of_posts}} blog posts covering different aspects of {{topic}} to establish thought leadership and drive organic traffic.
prompts.description: Creates engaging blog content to attract readers.

variables.name: number_of_posts
variables.description: The number of blog posts in the series

prompts.title: Create an Infographic on {{subject}}
prompts.content: Design an informative and visually appealing infographic on {{subject}} to simplify complex information and encourage social sharing.
prompts.description: Uses visuals to convey information effectively.

prompts.title: Develop a White Paper on {{industry_topic}}
prompts.content: Compose a comprehensive white paper on {{industry_topic}} that provides valuable insights and positions {{company_name}} as an industry expert.
prompts.description: Generates in-depth content to build authority.

variables.name: industry_topic
variables.description: The topic relevant to the industry

variables.name: company_name
variables.description: The company publishing the white paper

prompts.title: Plan a Webinar on {{topic}}
prompts.content: Outline and plan a webinar on {{topic}} targeting {{audience}}. Include key discussion points, speakers, and promotional strategies.
prompts.description: Engages the audience through interactive online events.

variables.name: topic
variables.example: Effective Social Media Strategies for Small Businesses

variables.name: audience
variables.description: The target audience for the webinar

prompts.title: Produce a Podcast Series on {{theme}}
prompts.content: Develop a podcast series focused on {{theme}}, including episode topics, guest speakers, and distribution platforms.
prompts.description: Creates audio content to reach audiences in a convenient format.

variables.name: theme
variables.description: The central theme of the podcast

prompts.title: Design a Case Study Showcasing {{success_story}}
prompts.content: Write a case study highlighting {{success_story}}. Detail the challenges faced, solutions provided by {{company}}, and the results achieved.
prompts.description: Demonstrates the effectiveness of products or services.

variables.name: success_story
variables.example: Increasing Sales by 50% with CRM Implementation

variables.name: company
variables.description: The company that provided the solution

prompts.title: Create an E-book on {{topic}}
prompts.content: Develop an e-book covering {{topic}} to provide in-depth information and generate leads through gated content.
prompts.description: Offers valuable content in exchange for customer information.

prompts.title: Plan a User-Generated Content Campaign
prompts.content: Design a campaign encouraging users to create and share content related to {{brand_or_product}}, leveraging social proof and increasing engagement.
prompts.description: Engages customers to participate in brand promotion.

variables.name: brand_or_product
variables.description: The brand or product to promote

prompts.title: Conduct a Content Gap Analysis
prompts.content: Analyze {{website}}'s existing content to identify gaps and opportunities. Provide recommendations for new content to meet audience needs and improve SEO.
prompts.description: Enhances content strategy by filling missing topics.

prompts.title: Create a Social Media Strategy for {{brand}}
prompts.content: Develop a social media marketing strategy for {{brand}} across platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn to achieve {{goal}}.
prompts.description: Plans social media activities to meet specific objectives.

variables.name: goal
variables.description: The main goal of the strategy

prompts.title: Design Engaging Social Media Posts for {{campaign}}
prompts.content: Create a series of social media posts for {{campaign}} that include compelling visuals, captions, and hashtags to drive engagement.
prompts.description: Generates content to support a specific campaign.

prompts.title: Analyze Social Media Metrics for {{profile}}
prompts.content: Provide an analysis of {{profile}}'s social media metrics, including follower growth, engagement rates, and content performance. Offer insights and recommendations.
prompts.description: Assesses social media performance to inform strategy.

variables.name: profile
variables.description: The social media profile to analyze

prompts.title: Plan a Social Media Contest or Giveaway
prompts.content: Outline a social media contest or giveaway for {{brand}} to increase engagement and followers. Include rules, prizes, and promotional tactics.
prompts.description: Engages audience through interactive promotions.

prompts.title: Develop a Social Media Content Calendar
prompts.content: Create a monthly content calendar for {{brand}}'s social media platforms, scheduling posts, stories, and live sessions.
prompts.description: Organizes social media content for consistent posting.

variables.name: brand
variables.description: The brand to create content for

prompts.title: Respond to Customer Inquiries on Social Media
prompts.content: Draft appropriate responses to common customer inquiries and comments on {{brand}}'s social media profiles to improve customer service.
prompts.description: Enhances customer relations through social channels.

prompts.title: Identify Influencers for Collaboration
prompts.content: Research and list potential influencers in the {{industry}} industry who align with {{brand}}'s values for collaboration opportunities.
prompts.description: Finds suitable influencers to expand reach.

prompts.title: Create Social Media Ads for {{product_or_service}}
prompts.content: Design and write copy for social media advertisements promoting {{product_or_service}}. Include target audience and call-to-action.
prompts.description: Generates paid ad content to boost sales.

variables.name: product_or_service
variables.description: The product or service to advertise

prompts.title: Monitor Social Media Trends
prompts.content: Identify and report on the latest social media trends relevant to {{industry}} to inform content creation and engagement strategies.
prompts.description: Keeps the brand's social media presence current and engaging.

prompts.title: Conduct a Social Media Audit
prompts.content: Perform a comprehensive audit of {{brand}}'s social media profiles to assess performance, consistency, and alignment with branding guidelines.
prompts.description: Evaluates social media effectiveness and identifies areas for improvement.

prompts.title: Create an Email Newsletter for {{brand}}
prompts.content: Compose a monthly email newsletter for {{brand}} that includes updates, promotions, and valuable content tailored to {{audience}}.
prompts.description: Generates an engaging newsletter to keep subscribers informed and interested.

variables.name: audience
variables.description: The target audience of the newsletter

prompts.title: Develop a Welcome Email Sequence for New Subscribers
prompts.content: Design a series of welcome emails for new subscribers to {{brand}}'s mailing list, introducing them to the brand, products, and special offers.
prompts.description: Creates an automated sequence to onboard new subscribers.

prompts.title: Write a Promotional Email Campaign for {{product_launch}}
prompts.content: Compose a promotional email campaign announcing the launch of {{product_launch}}, highlighting its features and benefits to generate excitement.
prompts.description: Drives awareness and sales for a new product.

prompts.title: Design Re-engagement Emails for Inactive Subscribers
prompts.content: Create emails aimed at re-engaging inactive subscribers of {{brand}}, offering incentives or reminding them of the benefits of the products or services.
prompts.description: Attempts to win back subscribers who have lost interest.

variables.name: brand
variables.description: The brand reaching out to subscribers

prompts.title: Personalize Email Content Based on Subscriber Data
prompts.content: Develop email templates that use subscriber data like {{data_points}} to personalize content, increasing relevance and engagement.
prompts.description: Enhances email effectiveness through personalization.

prompts.title: A/B Test Email Subject Lines
prompts.content: Create two variations of email subject lines for {{email_campaign}} to conduct an A/B test and determine which one has a higher open rate.
prompts.description: Optimizes email performance through testing.

prompts.title: Draft Transactional Emails for Order Confirmations
prompts.content: Write clear and concise transactional emails for {{brand}} to send order confirmations, including order details and next steps.
prompts.description: Provides important information to customers post-purchase.

variables.name: brand
variables.description: The brand sending the transactional email

prompts.title: Create a Cart Abandonment Email Sequence
prompts.content: Develop a series of emails to be sent to customers who have abandoned their shopping carts on {{ecommerce_website}}, encouraging them to complete their purchase.
prompts.description: Aims to recover lost sales from cart abandonment.

prompts.title: Segment Email List for Targeted Campaigns
prompts.content: Plan how to segment {{brand}}'s email list based on criteria like {{segmentation_criteria}} to send more targeted and effective email campaigns.
prompts.description: Improves campaign relevance through list segmentation.

variables.name: brand
variables.description: The brand with the email list

variables.name: segmentation_criteria
variables.description: The criteria for segmenting the list

prompts.title: Analyze Email Campaign Performance Metrics
prompts.content: Review the performance metrics of {{email_campaign}} such as open rates, click-through rates, and conversions, providing insights and recommendations.
prompts.description: Evaluates the effectiveness of email campaigns.

prompts.title: Create a Google Ads Campaign for {{product_or_service}}
prompts.content: Develop a Google Ads campaign to promote {{product_or_service}}, including keyword selection, ad groups, ad copy, and bidding strategies.
prompts.description: Sets up a paid search campaign to increase visibility.

variables.name: product_or_service
variables.description: The product or service to advertise

prompts.title: Perform Keyword Research for Paid Search
prompts.content: Identify high-performing keywords for {{campaign}} that balance search volume and cost-per-click to maximize ROI.
prompts.description: Finds effective keywords for SEM campaigns.

prompts.title: Set Up Bing Ads for {{business_name}}
prompts.content: Provide instructions for setting up Bing Ads for {{business_name}}, including account creation, campaign setup, and ad creation.
prompts.description: Expands paid search efforts to Bing's network.

prompts.title: Optimize Landing Pages for SEM Campaigns
prompts.content: Provide recommendations for optimizing landing pages linked to {{campaign}} to improve quality scores and conversion rates.
prompts.description: Enhances landing page effectiveness for better SEM performance.

prompts.title: Implement Remarketing Strategies in SEM
prompts.content: Design a remarketing campaign using {{ad_platform}} to target users who have previously visited {{website}} but did not convert.
prompts.description: Re-engages potential customers through targeted ads.

prompts.title: Analyze SEM Campaign Performance
prompts.content: Review the performance of {{campaign}} by analyzing metrics like click-through rates, cost-per-click, and conversion rates. Provide insights and optimization suggestions.
prompts.description: Evaluates SEM campaigns to improve results.

prompts.title: Set Up Conversion Tracking for SEM
prompts.content: Explain how to set up conversion tracking for {{campaign}} in {{ad_platform}} to measure the effectiveness of ads and optimize spending.
prompts.description: Tracks actions taken by users after clicking ads.

prompts.title: Create Ad Extensions for Enhanced Visibility
prompts.content: Design ad extensions for {{campaign}} such as sitelinks, callouts, and structured snippets to improve ad visibility and click-through rates.
prompts.description: Enhances ads with additional information and links.

prompts.title: Develop a Negative Keyword List
prompts.content: Create a list of negative keywords for {{campaign}} to prevent ads from showing on irrelevant searches, improving ROI.
prompts.description: Reduces wasted ad spend on irrelevant clicks.

prompts.title: Schedule Ads for Optimal Performance
prompts.content: Determine the best times and days to run ads for {{campaign}} based on target audience behavior and adjust ad scheduling accordingly.
prompts.description: Maximizes ad effectiveness by timing delivery.
